reviews.review: This game has a steep learning curve, and is fun with friends, so I would not recommend playing it alone or if you are not willing to put the effort forward to learn the game. I bought the game and played for 10 hours hoping to get better but couldnt and was denied a refund, so be careful.
great game michael myers is best killer to play as and people get mad if you 1 stab them also it is good content for twitch
Jogo top d+, dá pra se divertir em squad com os amigos
Довольно хороша игра, где исход зависит от команды

Игра в своем роде уникальна. Конечно, асинхронный геймплей мы уже видели, но тут совершенно иной подход. Во-первых, это стелс. Во-вторых, известные маньяки. В третьих, баланс (да-да я не шучу). Игра хорошая, но на любителя.
camping and fishing simulator,10/10 would be hooked and camped again
Gra jest bardzo dobra tylko na niskich rangach długo czeka się na grę.
Uhm don't know what to say really. With a full friends lobby it's fun and nice to play but, with a random hunter it's not fun anymore because you just can't win.

The community can be a bit hard to handle, but luckily, you can simply hide the chat box at the endgame chat screen. Overall, the game is thoroughly enjoyable and quite an adrenaline rush! The game has some bugs that usually get worked out over time, but it's still a playable despite what a lot of embellishers say. 
Good job so far, indeed!

Much spook. Var scar.

The game has had its ups and downs but is currently in a pretty great state, and despite some of the mechanics becoming monotonous after a few hundred hours of play, the game is so dynamic that it's something you can keep coming back to. There are vastly different methods and strategies to play with, dynamic maps, and you never really know what you're going to be up against when you enter a match, which is exciting.

Surviving with friends is super fun. The community is decent, and generally less toxic and more mature than a lot of games out there from my experience. With a dedicated developer committed to ever-evolving this game based on player feedback, I do recommend buying it if it looks interesting to you. Finally we will be getting dedicated servers in summer 2019, which should alleviate the network-related frustrations.

And oh, the killers... The character designs are generally fantastic. Dealing with, learning, adapting to, and trying to either hide from or mess with them without getting hooked is forever fun. Many killer players are efficient and brutal, some are more forgiving and fun, and will even participate in in-game memes you end up creating on the fly.

Playing as the killer is perhaps even more satisfying (if more stressful and difficult to master) - chasing and capturing the other players, and many skills to master.

The game evokes tons of feels, which is why I think contributes to such a passionate community. Hopefully it will continue to keep getting better with time as it already has.

It s a good game but the players are sooooooo goddamn toxic
If only every single killer didnt have a ping of around 200 this would be an amazing game
It very spooky but good game 10/10

Developers are sketchy as and the game is currently dying out.

However, the game is still enjoyable despite glitches and questionable balancing. New features that have been recently been added have helped the game still remain relevant and enjoyable.

El juego en si esta bien planteado, es bueno e impredecible, cada partida es distinta y con tantos objetos de modificación o mejoras cambia mucho el rumbo de una partida, como superviviente, el apoyo de equipo es necesario si no sera una partida fallida :c

you got friends, fun game.

Будь выжившим или стань охотником за жертвой! Игра затягивает, пусть и не замысловатым геймплеем.  Играя за выживших ваша цель починить генераторы, не попадаясь на глаза убийце. Тот в свою очередь будет появляться у вас за спиной в самые неподходящие моменты:)  Если в команде умелые тиммейты, то сбежать будет вполне выполнимой задачей.  Однако есть и свои недостатки у данной игры. Это дисбаланс...  К примеру от некоторых убийц убежать очень проблематично из за их сверхспособностей. Ну а если вы хотите сыграть за некоторых персонажей придется выложить реальные деньги.... Обновляют игру не часто, встречаются неадекватные игроки (как вам  дружелюбный убийца, который будет не атаковать, а бегать за вами и кивать головой?). Впрочем  не смотря на недостатки, игра всё же заслуживает внимания, особенно кто хочет сыграть с друзьями пару, тройку вечерков:)
Игра интересная но платные персонажи имба!!!
новых скинов на ивент нет,есть с прошлого года корона(вирус)и 9к радужки для перса,10 из 10 претти фор гуд жоб

Nesses últimos tempos a BHVR tem feito um ótimo trabalho em revigorar este jogo que estava fadado a morte. Atualizações constantes, pedindo sempre a opinião de seus jogadores, nerfaram aquelas porra daqueles god loop do crl e agora vem a dlc do silent hill, que na moralzinha memo, vai ser uma das melhores do jogo.

Como um player rank 1 já bastante experiente no jogo, tenho o imenso prazer de dizer que hj em dia Dead by Daylight vale sim a pena. Mas se tem uma coisa que eu posso dar de dica para novos players é o seguinte: ignorem a toxicidade da comunidade e aproveite o jogo do seu jeito, divirta-se acima de tudo. Quem ganha ou quem perde, no final, não importa.

Novamente, parabéns BHVR por todo o esforço de vcs em revitalizar o jogo. Nunca estive tão satisfeito.

OBS: um update gráfico está vindo aí e vai ser um puta upgrade no jogo. Chequem bem o setup de vcs antes de qualquer coisa ;)
